The video was published on August 28: 2020, on Facebook and has garnered over 1.2 million views.
The video claims to show a drone deliver: 3. The video's caption, written in traditional Chinese characters, translates to English as: "The era of unmanned aerial vehicle transportation and card swiping is approaching."
A reverse image search using keyframes g: WeVerify verification tool found the same video posted on Twitter on August 26, 2020, by a Nigerian content production company co-founder, who confirmed it to be a 3D visual effects animation.
